author: jleroux
msg: A 800x600 Layout for the POS. A patch from Terence Ng (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-2895) - OFBIZ-2895
More to come since as is it need a change in /specialpurpose/pos/config/xpos.properties, the variables of ClientWidth/ClientHeight have to be modified from 1024/768 to 800/600.
I hope to make this change automatic.

author: jukka
msg: TIKA-281: Use repository.apache.org to deploy snapshots and releases
Use the remote resources plugin and the appended-resources mechanism to handle embedded license metadata.
